abstract.t: Internet-Draft EVPN Multicast Synchronization Enhancement December 2018Ethernet Virtual Private Network (EVPN, RFC7432) solutions is becomingprevalent in Data Centers, Data Center Interconnect (DCI) and ServiceProvider VPN applications. In the scenario of multi-homing from a CE tomultiple PEs with links used in a single-active or all-activeredundancy mode, IGMP & MLD Join/Leave and PIM Join/RPT-Prunesynchronization procedures have been provided. This document specifiesan enhancement for IGMP/PIM signaling synchronization when usingdifferent Ethernet tag encapsulation mode.
